name: Protected-S3
description: Simple application that allows you to display the content of your S3 to authorised users only.

NODE_ENV.description: Set to production or your bucket will be open

DOMAIN.description: to whatever domain you are on

USE_SSL.description: set to to `1` unless you have a very good reason not to (credentials might leak there)

ALLOWED_DOMAINS.description: comma-separated list of domains you are accepting auth from
